auto_reply_templates.guild_greeting: Hey {sender}! Thanks for the message. I'm currently busy but will get back to you soon.
auto_reply_templates.guild_leader: Hello {sender}! I'll make sure to address your message when I'm available.
auto_reply_templates.guild_officer: Hi {sender}! I've noted your message and will respond when I can.
auto_reply_templates.guild_member: Thanks for reaching out, {sender}! I'll get back to you shortly.
auto_reply_templates.afk_response: I'm currently AFK but will respond when I return. Thanks for your patience!
auto_reply_templates.busy_response: I'm in the middle of something right now, but I'll respond when I'm free.
